Paragraph: The asymmetrical breakdown of the blood - brain barrier ( BBB ) was studied in female rats .

The entities "Blood" and "Brain" are not clearly referring to chemicals, so they were removed from the list. The entity "Barrier (BBB)" is a chemical entity because it refers to a physical barrier in the body that is composed of chemical molecules.
